alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 8:50PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong batch of winds will impact portions of northwestern Otero, east central Sierra and northeastern Dona Ana Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 848 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong area of winds just east of the San Andres. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northrup Landing, White Sands National Monument and Lake Lucero. This includes Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 182 and 200. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Tularosa Basin
